title: Bugaboo Fox Complete Full-Size Stroller, Black - Fully-Loaded Foldable Stroller with Advanced Suspension and All-Terrain Wheels
features: Seamless Maneuverability: For a smoother, more comfortable ride for both parent and baby, the Fox Complete full-size stroller features durable all-terrain wheels and advanced suspension! The plush ergonomic seat cradles your baby and sits them higher up for easy parent-bonding and interaction.

Intuitive, One-Piece Fold: Tired of fumbling with awkward strollers? So were we! The Fox Complete easy-fold stroller effortlessly collapses into one piece and has a self-standing option, so it’s easy to move and store.

Car Seat Compatible: The Bugaboo Fox is compatible with the Bugaboo Turtle Infant Car Seat without the use of adapters. When used with separate adapters, it is compatible with top car seat brands including Maxi Cosi, Chico, Clek, Nuna, Peg Perego, Britax and Cybex. Perfect for parents on the go, our infant to toddler stroller accommodates newborns and babies up to 48.5lbs!

Versatile Convenience: With an included rain cover, machine washable UPF 50+ sun canopy and an extra-large 22lb-capacity under-seat basket, our foldable stroller makes your day-to-day a bit more convenient! Show your style by changing the canopy, seat fabric, wheel caps or handlebar grips, which come in a variety of colors and styles.

Quality Parents Trust: Reflecting our commitment to sustainability, the Fox Complete is made with ultra-soft recycled fabrics! The best part? Every Bugaboo stroller undergoes 1,500 safety tests, so you’ll rest assured knowing your child is in good hands.
description: Give your baby a comfortable ride with the Bugaboo Fox Complete Stroller! Boasting a set of all- terrain wheels, this full-size stroller can handle everything from city streets to grass or gravel. But  no matter where you go, kids are cradled in a padded, ergonomic seat for maximum comfort. Safe  for children from birth (with the included bassinet) up to 48.5lbs, the Fox Complete will be a  member of the family for years to come.

Whether you’re running errands or catching up with friends, our intuitive, one-piece folding design  allows you to move through your day with ease! Compact and lightweight, it offers space-saving  storage at home or in the car. You can even change the canopy, seat fabric, wheel caps or handlebar  grips to show your style and personalize the look. Separate adapters make it compatible with top  car seat brands, so it’s truly a must-have for every parent!

From sustainable, recycled fabrics to hundreds of reliable safety tests, we never skimp on quality!  We want to give your family a stroller that’s soft and comfortable, yet durable enough to keep your  precious cargo safe and sound.
Why Choose the Fully-Loaded Fox Complete Stroller?

- Advanced suspension & all-terrain durable wheels for a smooth ride - Ultra-comfortable padded seat - Self-standing, easy-to-use foldable design - Great for infants and toddlers up to 48.5lbs - Use from birth with our included bassinet - Protective raincover (included) - Soft fabrics made from recycled materials
